input.label: Device:
input.populatingSearch: | stats count | eval device="All devices" | eval address="*" | inputlookup append=t insteon_devices | search (category=7 AND subcategory=9) OR device="All devices" | lookup insteon_device_types category subcategory OUTPUT category_name description | eval device=case(address=="*", device, NOT isnull(name), name, NOT isnull(address), address, NOT isnull(device), device) | stats count(device) by device, address

search.query: sourcetype=insteon_plm (to="$form.device$" OR from="$form.device$") (category=7 AND subcategory=9) all_link=1 all_link_group=0 | transaction from maxopenevents=2 endswith="cmd1=13" startswith="cmd1=11" | stats avg(duration) as duration | eval duration=round(duration, 2) | `timediff(duration,duration)`

sourcetype=insteon_plm (to="$form.device$" OR from="$form.device$") (category=7 AND subcategory=9) all_link=1 all_link_group=0 | transaction from maxopenevents=2 endswith="cmd1=13" startswith="cmd1=11" | streamstats range(_time) as duration window=2 | search duration > 0 | stats avg(duration) as average_duration | eval average_duration=round(average_duration, 2) | `timediff(average_duration,average_duration)`

sourcetype=insteon_plm (to="$form.device$" OR from="$form.device$") (category=7 AND subcategory=9) all_link=1 all_link_group=0 | sort -_time | head 1 | eval active=if(cmd1=11, 1, 0) | stats last(active) as active | rangemap field=active low=1-100 severe=0-0 default=severe | eval active=if(active=1,"active", "inactive")

sourcetype=insteon_plm (category=7 AND subcategory=9) (cmd1=11 OR cmd1=13) (to="$form.device$" OR from="$form.device$") all_link=1 all_link_group=0 | transaction from maxopenevents=2 endswith="cmd1=13" startswith="cmd1=11" | timechart sum(duration) sum(all_link) as count
